external_games.name: Train Simulator: Midland Main Line London-Bedford Route Add-On

name: Train Simulator: Midland Main Line London-Bedford Route Add-On
summary: One of England's most important main line railways comes to Train Simulator, joining the UK's capital city with the Home Counties commuter towns to Bedford. The Midland Main Line was built in stages between the 1830s and the 1870s, and originated as three railway lines which met at the Tri Junct Station in Derby.
